Books & Magazines
2D’s Private Journal

Release date: 29th June 2018

A replica of 2D’s journal from when The Now Now was being written; including song lyrics and a certificate of authenticity. It’s included with The Now Now (Deluxe Edition).

Song lyrics:

Humility
Tranz
Hollywood
Kansas
Sorcererz
Idaho
Lake Zurich
Magic City
Fire Flies
One Percent
Souk Eye
